data.title: Fraternity & Sorority Life
data.meta_description: Joining a fraternity or sorority at UA Little Rock is a great opportunity to find friends for life and grow inside and outside of the classroom. Learn more.
data.text:
Joining a fraternity or sorority at UA Little Rock is a unique opportunity to find friends for life and grow inside and outside of the classroom. Our fraternities and sororities are proud to maintain academic scholarship, partner in community service, and promote brotherhood/sisterhood.

UA Little Rock has three councils that govern Greek-letter organizations: College Panhellenic Council (CPC), Interfraternity Council (IFC), and National Pan-Hellenic Council (NPHC).

CPC sororities (women): Chi Omega and Kappa Delta

IFC fraternities (men): Delta Chi and Kappa Sigma

NPHC fraternities and sororities (men and women): Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity, Inc., Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Inc., Omega Psi Phi Fraternity, Inc., Phi Beta Sigma Fraternity, Inc., Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc., Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc., and Zeta Phi Beta Sorority, Inc.

Quick Facts About UA Little Rock Fraternities and Sororities
